DOC.brief_title: Comparative Evaluation Pharmacokinetics Safety BCD-055 Remicade Patients With Ankylosing Spondylitis
DOC.detailed_description: ASART-1 study first step clinical evaluation infliximab biosimilar manufacture JSC BIOCAD , Russia.The aim study establish BCD-055 equivalent Remicade term pharmacokinetics safety use standard regimen patient ankylose spondylitis ( AS ) . The study enroll 90 patient active AS , randomize 2 group ( 1:1 ratio ) : patient first group receive BCD-055 IV dose 5 mg/kg week 0 , 2 , 6 , 14 22 ; patient second group receive Remicade regimen .
